name: Graffiti Grinder
description:
Are you a graffiti loving problem child?

Grind through the city to collect graffiti tags, but watch out, the Anti-Graffiti Squad is on your tail! Dodge their traps and keep on tagging! GO! Make your mark on the city!

Controls

Left Mouse / W / Up Arrow - Jump
Right Mouse / S / Down Arrow - Dash Down

Controller support
A - Jump
X - Dash Down

Enjoy!

Press kit available here
